text: Sabrina is a 1954 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Billy Wilder and was based on the 1953 play Sabrina Fair by Samuel A. Taylor. It stars Audrey Hepburn, Humphrey Bogart, William Holden and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for 6 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1955. It was remade in 1995. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1954 romantic comedy movies Category:1954 romantic drama movies Category:1950s comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Billy Wilder Category:Movies set in country houses Category:Movies about social class Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies set in Paris
title: Sabrina (1954 movie)
